wikipedia_page.main: John Paulet, 14th Marquess of Winchester (3 June 1801 – 4 July 1887), styled Earl of Wiltshire until 1843, was a British peer and soldier.

response: *John Paulet, 14th Marquess of Winchester 27 October 1852 – 4 July 1887
*John Paulet, 14th Marquess of Winchester (1801–1887), British peer and soldier
Randolph married twice. Firstly Lady Lillian Mary Paulet, daughter of John Paulet, 14th Marquess of Winchester and the Hon. Mary Montagu, on 18 July 1884. There were two children:

The son of John Paulet, 14th Marquess of Winchester and Mary Montagu, the daughter of Henry Montagu, 6th Baron Rokeby, he was educated at Eton College and King's College London.‘WINCHESTER’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014 He succeeded his father to the peerage in 1887.
